welcome:
Hi, I'm LoScaricatoreBot.😉
Send me a YT link for the magic.🪄
not_a_link:
This isn't a link!⚠️
Send me a YT link, try again.😄
help:
Send me a YouTube link, choose the format you want, and I will send you the audio file (.m4a) or video file (.mp4).

Ways to send me the URL:
1 Share the video link directly from the YouTube app.
2 Copy and paste the link from your browser
3Use Telegram's inline bot by typing @vid titleVideo
video_too_long:
Video duration too long.🤔
(Choose a shorter video, maximum 8 minutes)
download_request:
Request made.👍
We're trying to download it.💿
download_error:
Sorry, download request failed.
We need some time to fix this.
send_request:
The download is finished.👌
We are now trying to send you the file.📤
send_error:
Sorry, request to send failed.
We need some time to fix this.
